name: ext_R3_Medication_package
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Medication.package for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Medication.package from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.comment: `Medication.package` has no related element in R4:Medication
